name: The $100,000 Pyramid
description:
The $100,000 Pyramid is a game developed by Hypnotix. It came out on 01-01-2001. Sierra On-Line published the game.
The $100,000 Pyramid is available on PC.
It was produced by =, 1999, 220–221 and pages. It was directed by =, 1999, 220–221 and pages. Bob Cobert scored the game.
